overview:
## Discussion

The value of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/selectedAnnotation] is either a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation] object, if the user selects one, or `null` if there aren’t any selected annotations.

An annotation is in a selected state if its [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation/selected] property is `true`. To deselect all annotations, set this property to `null`.

To select an annotation that’s already part of the map, set this property to the desired annotation.

When MapKit JS removes the selected annotation from the map (as an effect of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/removeAnnotation], [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/removeAnnotations], or setting a new set of annotations with the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/annotations] property), MapKit JS deselects it before removing it.

# selectedAnnotation

**Instance Property**

The selected annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
get selectedAnnotation(): Annotation | null;
set selectedAnnotation(annotation: Annotation | null);
```

## Discussion

The value of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/selectedAnnotation] is either a [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation] object, if the user selects one, or `null` if there aren’t any selected annotations.

An annotation is in a selected state if its [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Annotation/selected] property is `true`. To deselect all annotations, set this property to `null`.

To select an annotation that’s already part of the map, set this property to the desired annotation.

When MapKit JS removes the selected annotation from the map (as an effect of [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/removeAnnotation], [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/removeAnnotations], or setting a new set of annotations with the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/annotations] property), MapKit JS deselects it before removing it.

## Annotating the map

- **annotations**: An array of all the annotations on the map.
- **annotationForCluster**: A delegate method for modifying an annotation that represents a group of annotations that the framework combines into a cluster.
- **annotationsInMapRect(mapRect)**: Returns the list of annotation objects within the specified map rectangle.
- **addAnnotation(annotation)**: Adds an annotation to the map.
- **addAnnotations(annotations)**: Adds an array of annotations to the map.
- **removeAnnotation(annotation)**: Removes an annotation from the map.
- **removeAnnotations(annotations)**: Removes multiple annotations from the map.
